body:
https://ruqqus.com/@cyberpunk2075 ([archive](https://archive.is/LGgqp))

@cyberpunk2075 was a guildmaster of +IP2

Full ban message:

>unarmked OBVIOUSLY NSFL content

[Captainmeta4 mentions banning someone for "calling for a second Christchurch shooting"](https://ruqqus.com/post/2n4e/is-anyone-pessimistic-of-ip2s-presence/93wn). I'm not too sure if he's talking about him or someone else.

https://ruqqus.com/post/2myk/yikes

"what did u post?" - brentcatskel

"Christchurch mosque shooting, Black Ops 3 Edition" - kukluxklan

Edit: Found another post about it

https://ruqqus.com/post/2n9b/rip-cyberpunk2075

The post was "basically a mash-up video between the Christchurch footage and a Call of Duty game trailer."

Apparently one of the doxxers was HanayWhat, who was banned for "doxxing the person after whom it is named".

![](https://i.ibb.co/MR5FfzB/sfrohne.png)
body_html:

@cyberpunk2075 was a guildmaster of +IP2

Full ban message:

unarmked OBVIOUSLY NSFL content

Captainmeta4 mentions banning someone for "calling for a second Christchurch shooting". I'm not too sure if he's talking about him or someone else.

https://ruqqus.com/post/2myk/yikes

"what did u post?" - brentcatskel

"Christchurch mosque shooting, Black Ops 3 Edition" - kukluxklan

Edit: Found another post about it

https://ruqqus.com/post/2n9b/rip-cyberpunk2075

The post was "basically a mash-up video between the Christchurch footage and a Call of Duty game trailer."

Apparently one of the doxxers was HanayWhat, who was banned for "doxxing the person after whom it is named".
